text: Lars Emil Johansen (born 1946) was the Prime Minister of Greenland. He was the Prime Minister of Greenland from 1991-1997.Danish Parliament website He was born in Illorsuit. Johansen represented Greenland in the Parliament of Denmark from 1973, a position he regained in 2001 and held until 2009. He was speaker of the Inatsisartut from 2013 to 2018, after which he retired. ==References== Category:1946 births Category:Living people Category:Prime ministers of Greenland
title: Lars-Emil Johansen
